CHAT.comment: Mainly playing and singing in front of the video camera.
This file is the last of a series of eight (13a to 13h) for the same session.
Room next to the classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.

u.a: putting the animal cards back in their box .
Victor is probably playing on a bed .
William and Victor both want the photo album .
standing in front of the camera .
Dylan wants to see himself in the control screen of the camera .
right in front of the camera .
Dylan is too close to the camera and can't see himself .
imitating the noise of a car ?
Victor goes off with the microphone .
William also wants to play with the microphone .
taking the microphone from my hands .
showing Dylan how to hold the microphone .
William is now in front of the camera .
singing and banging with his feet .
William wants the microphone . Victor doesn't want to let it go .
trying to sing again but gets interrupted by Victor .
Victor wants to take the microphone .
Dylan has jumped on a bed .
